TopicTitle: Possibly the worst decision the devs have ever made so far.

Articles.Content:
Seriously, why does everyone hate Comic Sans? It's a font.

Because it's ugly and far too many people use it inappropriately.
What's wrong with comic sans? I don't have any problem.

Because it's ugly and far too many people use it inappropriately.

It doesn't look ugly to me.

Also, a lot of those pictures are fake.

There's nothing wrong with Comic Sans, people just hate it because it's been over utilised. Now a lot of the time it's just directionless and snowballed hipster rage.

People also hate Arial because it's a ripoff of Helvetica, not because they dislike the look of it.

Now Papyrus.....there's a font to hate.
Honestly, if we were all going to be so serious about this, we might as well be writing in a more orderly font.
What I want to know is, why are we arguing over the font the sciencey thing displays? Comic sans is just a font. Nothing else.

I... don't see a problem with using comic sans there

1. It's not overused

2. It's not everywhere

3. You only get to see it when it's opened.

Stop font discrimination. It's like racism, only worst.

I agree, I dont see the point of people argguing over ComicSans
Hang on, the text doesnt look like comic sans at all, probably the resolutiuon but then agian, WHO CARES?

I don't care if they use Comic Sans. But I still hate it because it reminds me of those psychopathic witches from the Human Resources department who like to compose emails in Comic Sans and colour every other word.

IMO I would rather not see it in the game.

There is a reason why so many people do not like it. Should have died with Microsoft Bob, but kind of infected other applications and spread like a virus. People with no taste being natural vectors for the disease.

Bha, Microsoft... Jobs said it best;

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mOgOP_aqqtg

Things to do while waiting for 0.22 ... a thread on fonts!
